title: Upgrade
custom_preconds: Given the device has the store build installed
custom_steps: When the user installs the new version over the store build
custom_expected:
Then the user should verify the app upgrade was successful 
and that the app still functions properly 
and the previous settings were saved (i.e favorite team, notifications, etc.)

title: New Teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the team has undergone a change

i.e.
- team name change
- team id changed
- team affiliate changed
- team logo changed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user upgrades to new version
adds adds that team as a favorite team
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to select the team and navigate through the app, the app should not crash
